title: Haaland's Race for History
description:
The FC crew discuss Erling Haaland continuing his historic form and debate whether he could become Premier League's all-time top scorer. Plus, Son Heung-Min redeems himself with a hat trick off the bench, Robert Lewandowski brace influences Barcelona, and Bayern Munich's Bundesliga slide continues with a shock defeat.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Haaland's historic race; Son's redemption; Lewandowski's brace brings Barca back; Bayern's shock loss
